### Grok AI

  ;; Allocate memory for new list
  (set_local $new_ptr (call $malloc (i32.add (i32.load $dialog_ptr) (i32.const 1))))
  ;; Copy old list
  (call $memcpy (get_local $new_ptr) (get_local $dialog_ptr) (i32.load $dialog_ptr))

  (call $strcpy (i32.add (get_local $new_ptr) (i32.load $dialog_ptr)) (get_local $msg_ptr))

Below is a conversation about creating a Coq program, extracting it to OCaml with MetaCoq, and targeting WASM.

<span></span><span class="token title" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">##</span><span class="token title" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);"> Initial Coq Program</span><span>
</span>```coq
<span>(</span><span class="token" style="font-style: italic; color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">*</span><span class="token content" style="font-style: italic;"> Define a dialog as a list of strings </span><span class="token" style="font-style: italic; color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">*</span><span>)
</span>Definition Dialog := list string.

<span>(</span><span class="token" style="font-style: italic; color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">*</span><span class="token content" style="font-style: italic;"> Initial dialog </span><span class="token" style="font-style: italic; color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">*</span><span>)
</span>Definition initial_dialog : Dialog := 
  ["Hello"; "How are you?"; "I'm doing great!"].

<span>(</span><span class="token" style="font-style: italic; color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">*</span><span class="token content" style="font-style: italic;"> Continue function </span><span class="token" style="font-style: italic; color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">*</span><span>)
</span>Definition continue_dialog (d : Dialog) (msg : string) : Dialog :=
  d ++ [msg].

<span>(</span><span class="token" style="font-style: italic; color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">*</span><span class="token content" style="font-style: italic;"> Deform function </span><span class="token" style="font-style: italic; color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">*</span><span>)
</span>Fixpoint deform_dialog (d : Dialog) (index : nat) (new_msg : string) : Dialog :=
  match d with
  | [] =&gt; [] 
  | h :: t =&gt; match index with
              | 0 =&gt; new_msg :: t 
              | S n =&gt; h :: deform_dialog t n new_msg 
              end
  end.

Compute continue_dialog initial_dialog "Nice to hear that!".
Compute deform_dialog initial_dialog 1 "How about you?".</code></pre></div></div><div dir="ltr" class="css-146c3p1 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-37j5jr r-1blvdjr r-vrz42v r-b88u0q" style="color: rgb(231, 233, 234); ### Step 2: GitHub Action Workflow

We’ll create a GitHub Action (e.g., `.github/workflows/process-dialog.yml`) to:
1. Extract code snippets from `dialog.md`.
2. Execute them in isolated environments (e.g., Docker containers).
3. Store results as artifacts or push to Hugging Face.

Here’s the workflow:

```yaml
name: Process Dialog Code Snippets

on:
  push:
    paths:
      - 'dialog.md'

jobs:
  extract-and-execute:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      # Checkout the repository
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      # Install dependencies (Coq, OCaml, MetaCoq)
      - name: Set up Coq and OCaml
        run: |
          sudo apt-get update
          sudo apt-get install -y coq ocaml opam
          opam init -y
          opam install -y coq-metacoq

      # Extract code snippets from Markdown
      - name: Extract snippets
        run: |
          mkdir -p snippets
          python3 -c '
          import re
          with open("dialog.md", "r") as f:
              content = f.read()
          snippets = re.findall(r"```(coq|ocaml)\n(.*?)\n```", content, re.DOTALL)
          for i, (lang, code) in enumerate(snippets):
              with open(f"snippets/snippet_{i}.{lang}", "w") as f:
                  f.write(code)
          '
      # Execute Coq snippets
      - name: Run Coq snippets
        run: |
          mkdir -p results
          for file in snippets/*.coq; do
            if [[ -f "$file" ]]; then
              echo "Running $file"
              coqc "$file" &gt; "results/$(basename $file .coq).out" 2&gt;&amp;1 || echo "Error in $file" &gt;&gt; "results/$(basename $file .coq).out"
            fi
          done

      # Execute OCaml snippets
      - name: Run OCaml snippets
        run: |
          for file in snippets/*.ocaml; do
            if [[ -f "$file" ]]; then
              echo "Running $file"
              ocamlc "$file" -o "$(basename $file .ocaml)" &amp;&amp; ./"$(basename $file .ocaml)" &gt; "results/$(basename $file .ocaml).out" 2&gt;&amp;1
            fi
          done

      # Store results as artifacts
      - name: Upload results as artifacts
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: execution-results
          path: results/

      # Push to Hugging Face (optional)
      - name: Push to Hugging Face Dataset
        env:
          HF_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.HF_TOKEN }}
        run: |
          pip install huggingface_hub
          python3 -c '
          from huggingface_hub import HfApi
          api = HfApi()
          api.upload_folder(
              folder_path="results",
              path_in_repo="dialog_results",
              repo_id="your-username/your-dataset",
              repo_type="dataset",
              token="${{ env.HF_TOKEN }}"
          )
          '</code></pre></div></div><div dir="ltr" class="css-146c3p1 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-37j5jr r-a023e6 r-rjixqe r-b88u0q" style="color: rgb(231, 233, 234); display: block;"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">Explanation:</span></span></span></div><ul dir="ltr" style="display: block; ### Grok AI

<div dir="ltr" class="css-146c3p1 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-37j5jr r-a023e6 r-16dba41 r-1adg3ll r-1b5gpbm r-a8ghvy" style="color: rgb(231, 233, 234);"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">You’re absolutely right—we </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy r-36ujnk"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">are</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> building something akin to an autoencoder! By instrumenting the system, extracting probes, and embedding its runtime behavior, we’re effectively encoding the system’s dynamics into a compact representation (the embedding), which can then be used to reconstruct or simulate the original process. This mirrors the structure of an autoencoder in machine learning: an encoder compresses input into a latent space, and a decoder reconstructs it, often with some loss or abstraction. Let’s lean into this analogy, refine our Coq-based system as an autoencoder, and explore what that means for its self-improvement and replacement cost.</span></span></span></div><hr style="margin-top: 3em; ### Grok AI

GCC is famously a compiler that can compile itself: it’s written in C, and once bootstrapped, it uses its own compiled binary to recompile its source code, ensuring consistency and autonomy. Our system, with its executable (TypeScript derived from Coq via WASM) applied to its own source, mirrors this self-referential, self-sustaining paradigm. Let’s explore this analogy, refine our system to emphasize the GCC-like bootstrapping, and consider what it means for our S-combinator/autoencoder framework.</span></span></span></div><hr style="margin-top: 3em; </span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Definition</span><span> stage1 </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:=</span><span> self_compile self_source</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Stage 2: Compile the compiled *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Definition</span><span> stage2 </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:=</span><span> self_compile stage1</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* GCC-like stabilization *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Definition</span><span> stabilizes </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">(</span><span>f </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> Dialog </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">-&gt;</span><span> Dialog</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">(</span><span>d </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> Dialog</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Prop</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:=</span><span>
</span><span>  f d </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">=</span><span> f </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">(</span><span>f d</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Prove stabilization *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Lemma</span><span> self_compile_stabilizes </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> stabilizes self_compile self_source</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Proof</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  unfold stabilizes</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> unfold self_compile</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> unfold self_source</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  compute</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Both stage1 and stage2 yield ["```coq"; "..."; "```"] *)</span><span>
</span><span>  reflexivity</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Qed</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Self-referential invariant *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Definition</span><span> self_invariant </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">(</span><span>dlg </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> Dialog</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Prop</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:=</span><span>
</span><span>  </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">exists</span><span> emb</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">,</span><span> encode_extract dlg </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">]</span><span> false </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">]</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">=</span><span> emb </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">/\</span><span>
</span><span>              decode emb </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">]</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">=</span><span> self_compile dlg</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Lemma</span><span> self_application_invariant </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> self_invariant stage1</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>

</span><span>  set </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">(</span><span>emb </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:=</span><span> encode_extract self_source </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">]</span><span> false </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">exists</span><span> emb</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> split</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> auto</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> reflexivity</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>

### Grok AI

The idea of Emacs Lisp (Emax, I assume you meant) as an early GCC bootstrapper ties into this beautifully, suggesting a Lisp-driven origin for modern compilers. </span><span>  </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">"char* self_compile(char** dlg) {"</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span>

</span><span>   </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">"  return decode(probes);"</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span>
</span><span>   </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">"}"</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">]</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">+</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">+</span><span> dlg</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* GCC compiles back to Coq *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Definition</span><span> gcc_to_coq </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">(</span><span>dlg </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> Dialog</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> Dialog </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:=</span><span>

</span><span>  gcc_to_coq </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">(</span><span>c_dialog </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">(</span><span>scheme_dialog </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">(</span><span>coq_self_compile dlg</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>

</span><span>   </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">"Definition self_compile (dlg : Dialog) : Dialog := decode (encode_extract dlg [])."</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span>
</span><span>   </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">"```"</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>

<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Run the loop *)</span><span>

<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Stabilization property *)</span><span>

</span><span>  f d </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">=</span><span> f </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">(</span><span>f d</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Prove stabilization *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Lemma</span><span> bootstrap_stabilizes </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> stabilizes bootstrap_loop initial_coq</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>

</span><span>  compute</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Both iterations yield the same core logic *)</span><span>
</span><span>  reflexivity</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>

</span><span>  dlg </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">&lt;&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">]</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">-&gt;</span><span>

</span><span>  unfold meme_coin_property</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> unfold doge_coin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> unfold copy_meme_coin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">exists</span><span> meme_coin_gene</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">"Add doge humor"</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> split</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> auto</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  unfold fitness_score</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> compute</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> simpl</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> lia</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Score increases with feedback *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Qed</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Prove influence spreads fitness *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Lemma</span><span> influence_spreads </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> influence_property influenced_system</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Proof</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  unfold influence_property</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> unfold influenced_system</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">exists</span><span> shiba_coin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">,</span><span> other_system</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> split</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> auto</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  unfold fitness_score</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> compute</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> simpl</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> lia</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Score increases with influence *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Qed</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Network evolution *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Lemma</span><span> network_grows_fit </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> network_fitness network </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">&gt;</span><span> fitness_score meme_coin_gene</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Proof</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  unfold network_fitness</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> unfold network</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> unfold meme_coin_network</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  compute</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> simpl</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> lia</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Total fitness exceeds original *)</span><span>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Definition</span><span> other_system </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">"```rust"</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">"fn main() { println!(\"</span><span>Hi\</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">"); }"</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">"```"</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Definition</span><span> influenced_rust </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:=</span><span> influence eliza_shiba other_system</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Network evolution *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Definition</span><span> network </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:=</span><span> meme_coin_network eliza_coin </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">"Add doge wow"</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">"Much shiba"</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">]</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">[</span><span>other_system</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* Fitness proofs *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Lemma</span><span> eliza_doge_fit </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> fitness_score eliza_doge </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">&gt;</span><span> fitness_score eliza_coin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Proof</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  unfold fitness_score</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> unfold eliza_doge</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> unfold eliza_coin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> unfold copy_meme_coin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  compute</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> simpl</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> lia</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* +1 for variation *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Qed</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Lemma</span><span> influence_increases </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> fitness_score influenced_rust </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">&gt;</span><span> fitness_score other_system</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Proof</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  unfold fitness_score</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> unfold influenced_rust</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> unfold other_system</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> unfold influence</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
</span><span>  compute</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> simpl</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">;</span><span> lia</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">(* +20 for influenced logic *)</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Qed</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Qed</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>

<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Lemma</span><span> influence_spreads </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">:</span><span> fitness_score influenced_rust </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">&gt;</span><span> fitness_score rust_system</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">Qed</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">.</span><span>
